title: National Typographic
content:
**[Indices](http://web.archive.org/web/20131101070712/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Indices) : [Publications](http://web.archive.org/web/20131101070712/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Publications) : National Typographic**

A quarterly newsletter produced by [Monotype Imaging](http://web.archive.org/web/20131101070712/http:/typophile.com/wiki/monotype_imaging_inc)  
To subscribe, enter your mailing address [here](http://web.archive.org/web/20131101070712/http:/www.nationaltypographic.com/).

Spring 2005  
- Featured Designer: [Michael Harvey](http://web.archive.org/web/20131101070712/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Michael%20Harvey)  
- "Condensed Typefaces" by [Ilene Strizver](http://web.archive.org/web/20131101070712/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Ilene%20Strizver)  
- New Releases: [Mentor](http://web.archive.org/web/20131101070712/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Mentor), [ITC Astro](http://web.archive.org/web/20131101070712/http:/typophile.com/wiki/ITC%20Astro), [ITC Tyke](http://web.archive.org/web/20131101070712/http:/typophile.com/wiki/ITC%20Tyke)  
- Letter Series: The Letter O  
- Typeface Showcase: [Texas Hero](http://web.archive.org/web/20131101070712/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Texas%20Hero)  
- Preview: The new [Fonts.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20131101070712/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Fonts.com)

Winter 2005  
- Featured Designer: [Nick Shinn](http://web.archive.org/web/20131101070712/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Nick%20Shinn)  
- New Releases: [Neo Sans](http://web.archive.org/web/20131101070712/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Neo%20Sans), [ITC Resavska](http://web.archive.org/web/20131101070712/http:/typophile.com/wiki/ITC%20Resavska), [ITS Resavska Sans](http://web.archive.org/web/20131101070712/http:/typophile.com/wiki/ITS%20Resavska%20Sans)  
- "A Bodoni by Any Other Name..." by [Ilene Strizver](http://web.archive.org/web/20131101070712/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Ilene%20Strizver)  
- Ask the Type Guru: (origin of copperplate) by [Allan Haley](http://web.archive.org/web/20131101070712/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Allan%20Haley)  
- Letter Series: The Letter N  
- Typeface Showcase: [ITC Leawood](http://web.archive.org/web/20131101070712/http:/typophile.com/wiki/ITC%20Leawood)
author: James Grieshaber
